SHA: the second frog (Fomalhaut was once the first)
the scorching one (popularly, the dog star)
before the dog (rising before the dog star, Sirius)
Zeus' other twin son (Castor, α Gem, is the first twin)
shortened form of Al Suhail, one Arabic name for Canopus
leader of the daughters of the bier
shortened form of "north star" (named when it was that,[Note 4] ca. 1500 BC – AD 300).
cocked-up part of the scorpion's tail
southern part of the bow (of Sagittarius)
Coined from the English name of the constellation
bright one (of the southern fish's tail)
